"The seas are rising and so are we!" Beautiful souls filling the streets for today's #marchforscience in Boston! Gratitude to the people worldwide who spent the day making their voices heard in favor of science-based policy, climate action, funding for science & the EPA, alternative energy research and development, endangered species, and so much more!! I'm with YOU and her ‚û°Ô∏èüåé‚¨ÖÔ∏èü§ì!! #thankfulforscience #climateactionnow #toomuchatstake

Today I rejoice to be alive on this fantastic planet, grateful for another 24 hours sustained by our sacred Mama Earth, and excited to feel an eco-awakening gaining momentum! We still have a long way to go, but by loving the Earth through our everyday efforts to live with less impact, we are creating change and simultaneously cultivating a rewarding connection to our great living planet. May we all more deeply understand that respecting her is respecting ourselves too! ... it's moments like this--greeted by a manta ray family on the way into a reef pass--that keep me energized to stay accountable for my actions, stay the course for the good fight, and have faith that every effort toward a sustainable future MATTERS!! Happy #EarthDay2017! üì∑@jodymacdonaldphoto (thank you for climbing up that mast and capturing this holy moment of Swell underway! It's my favorite photo ever.) @patagonia_surf @mizulife @loveavasol @wavetribe @fcdsurfboards @firewiresurfboards @ecoflex_ @zealoptics @b4bc @changingtidesfoundation #VoyageofSwell #everydayactivist #loveyourMother

‚ÄúChange is possible. It starts with us.‚Äù Happy Friday... Need a little inspiration before the #plasticswearjar challenge tomorrow?? This is what i'll be watching tonight after I finish laying the floors in Swell!  Watch it now on Netflix. Or rent it through the link in my bio @aplasticocean #plasticoceans #mustwatch @patagonia_surf @mizulife @loveavasol @changingtidesfoundation

Announcing the Plastic Swear Jar Challenge!  My sistas and I at @changingtidesfoundation are launching this 7-day challenge starting Earth Day, Saturday April 22, in an effort to bring awareness and accountability to the amount of single use plastic waste we create on a daily basis. I'm inviting you to participate too!  All you have to do is make your own 'swear jar' and any time you use a single use plastic item such as a water bottle, plastic bag, straw, or plastic cutlery during the challenge, you put a dollar (or whatever you're comfortable with) into your jar. At the end we hope to all be more aware of the plastic we use and maybe think of ways to eliminate it from our daily routines. I'll be donating whatever ends up in my jar to @changingtidesfoundation's environmental initiatives. Click the link in my bio üëÜüèº for more info! And let me know if you're in! xoxo üåè ‚ôªÔ∏è
#earthday #noexcuseforsingleuse #plasticchallenge  #ecominded #reduce #recycle #protectourplanet #earthweek #earthmonth #earthdayeveryday #togetherwearebetter #servenaturally

A nature-loving, slow sailing, surf-worshipping, spiritually curious, plant-based eating, sun-wrinkled, freedom fighting, Wim Hof breathing, Earth protecting, animal respecting, ever-casual, tool toting, excessively sensitive, yoga practicing, plastic avoiding, knot tying, peace promoting, @Patagonia representing, boat repairing, indecisive, eco-board riding, un-matching sandal wearing, carbon calculating, cat whispering, trash sorting, daily praying, moonlight dancing, reggae listening, good vibes loving, shaka throwing: She-captain. Thrilled to feel new waves of people ready to join hands and hearts for our Mama Earth! // repost from  @tinyatlasquarterly
„Éª„Éª„Éª
Water is life. After @allswellcreative brought @captainlizclark - an inspiring activist, sea woman and sailor -to meet us in Teahupo'o- our whole crew was inspired to step up our environmental activism. We are now planning a silent auction and large scale photo show for this summer with the work from our trip. 100% of the proceeds from the show and auction will benefit the planet and communities in Tahiti where climate change is putting families most as risk. We are newly energized to do our part to help. Companies and organizations let us know if you would like to collaborate as we begin planning. This image by @dantom // Yay!! üíô

Still abuzz after spending the weekend with these most positive, creative, courageous souls!! A sincere discussion about environmental activism through social media, a thoughtful & wonderfully intimate hour for the @allswellcreative writing workshop, a few waves and lots of adrenaline at Teahupo'o, grilled avocados by @cookwilltravel and a local band, plus countless inspiring conversations with a group of truly extraordinary humans !! Thank you to my sea sis @lauralrubin, and Tom & James of @earthmissions for making Tahui and I part of this beautiful gathering. And @theproducerdotcom for picking us up! This fun human collage was a collaboration between photo art masterminds @omjsk, @saltywings, & @twheat ... highly worth having a look at their accounts, along with @dantom, @tashavanzandt, @ernathan @cavanimages @tinyatlasquarterly, @pavlesvc!! Thank you all for your loving spirits and fearless dream chasing!!
